name: 图论计数 (Graph Enumeration)
complexity: Varies: O(n^2) for simple DP, O(n log n) for polynomial methods, O(p(n)) for partition enumeration (p(n) is number of partitions of n).
scenarios: Counting labeled/unlabeled graphs with specific properties (e.g., connected, Eulerian, bipartite, trees, simple graphs).
extensions: Polya enumeration theorem, generating functions (OGF/EGF), Euler transform, Riddell's formula, partition-based enumeration for unlabeled graphs.
